text.tspan: Creation of a single XML format
Maarten van Gompel, Martin Reynaert & Antal van den Bosch
Tilburg Center for Cognition and Communication
- The linguistic annotations used must be declared
- Declarations may define a default set, annotator, etc...
- Usage of further metadata is free; CMDI recommended
FoLiA development is being funded by CLARIN-NL (www.clarin.nl)
